name: dsa-project-repo
description: Lightweight C++ version-control CLI with Windows batch interface

scripts.build: g++ -std=c++17 -O2 -Wall -Wextra -I ./src -o ./build/main.exe src/main.cpp src/cli/parser.cpp src/cli/commands.cpp src/core/utils.cpp src/core/diff.cpp src/core/patch.cpp src/core/repo.cpp src/core/version.cpp src/core/crypto.cpp src/storage/file_manager.cpp src/storage/metadata.cpp

author: lokeshkaria14
